post:
![](https://my.racknerd.com/assets/img/logo.png  "")

We are pleased to announce that we have expanded our shared and reseller hosting product line to Frankfurt, Germany! In Frankfurt, we are located within the Telehouse datacenter and leverage a network blend consisting of Deutsche Telekom, Level 3, Telia, Cogent, DE-CIX, LINX offering strong connectivity :)

During the order checkout process on any of the below promo’s, you will see the ability to choose the location you wish for your account to be deployed in, including our newest location Germany.

We understand the demand within the shared and reseller hosting landscape, by end-users and reseller's choice, is still today leaning towards cPanel & WHM. It is a control panel that end-users (both tech savvy and non tech savvy) are most familiar with, enabling our resellers to be successful in conversions, and allowing them to scale their business as a result.

We are happy to be able to introduce the below special promotions, offering competitive pricing while fulfilling exactly what the market desires. The below offers are powered by the cPanel/WHM control panel, and include our awesome features such as offsite daily backups powered by JetBackup, MailChannels Hybrid, LiteSpeed Web Server w/ LSCache, CloudLinux, Softaculous, KernelCare and more. We're currently also looking at site builder software options, so that should be added on all servers soon as well. On top of all that, we have more value added features and exciting news to be announced within the upcoming weeks.
